sharing_roles: Share Judy, Beatrix, Woman-devil and Author as 2:2. For example, especially suitable is:
Judy, Beatrix and Author must be shared between other 2 players in such way:
No matter whose will be Helen and Cassandra, because there are very little of their words.

Author's words: Judy, Beatrix and Woman-devil take part in this part. Judy is visiting Woman-devil's living place and meet her together with Beatrix. Beatrix and Judy negotiated that Beatrix would write to Woman-devil a letter where she would discuss date, time and place of meeting. Before Judy came her friends were not squared off by the question about Judy's walking to Woman-devil.

Judy: Do you think there is a jeopardy to accept the idea to go thither?

Cassandra: Do you see, devil is associated with evil for human. It was said in our recent conversation.

Judy: But I don't trust this prejudices. I do not like your tumult, but I like the idea. I have Beatrix who warants that there is no serious menace for us. Let her be responsible for her words. And Resignation is the one what remains to you.

Cassandra: It is like you have impression scarcity.

Judy: I don't have impression fertility . I am a monster another breed unlike you two. Woman-devil can feel who is in front of her and our not natural human view is not a hurdle for her to know who we really are. Because of I am not such monster as both of you are, I can not worry about Woman-devil's relationships with me as you can because the breed which I belong doesn't have many signs similiar to her signs. I read much about it. I will not abdicate the unusual intriguing proposal of Beatrix. I think it will be something just pulsatile to meet with those who created the extradecomposers! They are interesting creatures! So it is such eagerness! Beatrix has already send a letter to Woman-devil. In this letter she asked her such some questions which imply the information which can help successfully to plan our meeting.

Author's words: Notice: Intrinsically Helen, Judy and Cassandra are monsters, but some time ago they were turned into people with one purpose. It will be explained notably later.

Helen: It is a clever thought, really. In fact, it is not so surprising that Judy is not afraid. You will be a great connoiseur possessing knowledges in the extra-decomposers area, won't you?

Judy: Maybe, but now I am not planning became a scientist like Christian.

Author's words: A little time later Judy and Beatrix met each-other and talked about the trip to Woman-devil. Beatrix told Judy about such aspects as date, time and place of meeting. There were a few dates when the host would be not at home. Beatrix said that Judy that she could go in any of them.

Beatrix: There is a necessarity that the host did not see us.

Judy: Why it is so?

Beatrix: According to the Woman-devil's words precense of extraneous people can summon host's backlash.

Judy: It is strange. What is wrong with this host?

Beatrix: You know, you do not know, of course, the host is not absolutely adequate. But do not worry, please. Also you do not know how strong is Woman-devil. She will defense you from any psycho. But what should  we talk about it if he will not be at home when we go.

Judy: There are some questions interesting for me. Is it so dirty in the lake as in the swamp?

Beatrix: No, of course, it is not. I told that it is not so dirty in this lake. Have you forgotten?

Judy: Yes. You told. I have forgotten. I am sorry.

Beatrix: Not so big trouble. Do not hold it in your mind so sensually

Judy: And other question. Will Woman-devil be unclad in our meeting? I do not want it was so.

Beatrix: Well, I'll write her with a polite request not to be unclad in front of you. More precisely you will write under my dictation because I can not write, Ð° course.

Author's words: Judy and Beatrix met Woman-devil near Judy's living place. Woman-devil arrived there on her horse. Of course, it was an appalling acquaintance for Judy. She saw that Woman-devil looked not very similar to a usual human. She looked like Beatrix described her in the conversation with Judy and her friends. But Woman-devil was a bit like an ugly scarecrow. Also she was not very similar to a human. She was closer to an attractive toy than to a horrible monster or a human. Her figure was more similar to a figure of a toy than a human figure. Her head was not less wide than shoulders. Her height was lower than Judy's height. It reached Judy's lips. Eyes were very big and their form was more similar to circles than to form of human eyes. Accordingly to it her edge were so big. Hair was in thick and long scythe ending lower her polly. Accordingly to Judy's feelings Woman-devil's hair were very dense like toy's hair. Her polly was visibly wider than the part of her body from shoulders till waist. It seemed daunt to Judy. She did not like it at the first moment. But Woman-devil smiled friendly and kindly very soon since the first moment when Judy watched at her face. At this moment Judy's perception was changed colossaly. She was surprised how she could perceive Woman-devil's face negatively. Even when her smile had dissapeared from her face Judy was continuing to perceive Woman-devil's face very positively. Woman-devil was closed in a dark swimsuit and dark cloak on her back. Beatrix presented her and Judy to each-other.

Judy: Hi, Woman-devil. Nice to meet you.

Woman-devil: For you, Lady Devil

Beatrix: I am glad you are getting acquainted. Judy, this is the Woman=devil, the person about whom I told you, Helen and Cassandra. Lady devil, This is Judy. Woman-devil is a great inhabitant on out planet. She has created indispensable remedy to defense this planet from carrion depletion.

Woman-devil: This is a very clever postulation. I can tell you, Judy, more about myself. I really have great magical forces and create my extra-decomposers through them. I gave them such title as extra-decomposers. I gqve Beatrix life. I did not create her, but I remade her. She was very ill and dead. I freed her from illness, turned her into alive, but sleepy human. After that I reduced her, added her respiratory system to breathe water and rolled up in a cocoon, created through my magical forces. Some time later I launched the cocoon. Beatrix woke up with these pretty and bright wigs and horns like wigs and horns of a butterfly. We greeted each-other and told about themselves. After that I allowed her to fly and live everywhere where she wanted. When I and Beatrix had met again she told me about her life in the your friend's aquarium, ocean, swamp and the aquarium of those abhorrent people. Now she has the debt in front of me - to play out a role of an extra-decomposer, because I helped her to aquire life 2 times. I can endue animals consciousness. So I have endued some snakes and swans. Now they understand what I want from them like people. So some swans can serve us as postmen. So I and Beatrix penned when Beatrix lived in the acquarium of your friend. Besides, as you, maybe know, I am here with one serious purpose.

Beatrix: And, as I know, you know, what purpose is it. You and all your friends whom I met know as I think. At first turn, Helen with whom I communicated about my mission and place in nature.

Judy: Yes, we know, of course.

Beatrix: And our appearance is straight related with Woman-devil. She has created us. So, the mission about which she said is to help nature through us.

Woman-devil: Yes, I am a really strong and omnipotent person. We are going to show you many wonders which are her subject.

Judy: Your omnipotence is something so great! How do you create all these extra-decomposers?

Woman-devil: I create them through my magic, of course. Do you want go with us in water of ocean?

Judy: No, I do not. Thank you. I am not going, because I can not breathe water like you.

Beatrix: And you have not acquired a diving suit?

Judy: Sorry, I did not have a possibility to acquire it.

Beatrix: It is a pity that you can not plunge into underwater world with us. It is wonderful under  water.

Woman-devil: As I know people can not communicate with marine animals besides they can not breathe under water without special water accessories. If Judy can not plunge under water with us lets not to torment ourselves with this disadvantage. We can have a wonderful time out of the ocean.

Judy: Excuse me, Lady Devil. Did you intend to invite me to be on meeting with you in an ocean except in the lake?

Woman-devil: No, you are not entirely right. There was no invitation to go to lake. There was only my suggestion to visit a part of the ocean. I, Beatrix and many other animals now live in the ocean. We have our confined with a border part in ocean. There a lot of other different marine animals live in this part with us. We are a big friendly company. Moreover, I was born in the bottom of the ocean. There I have been living during whole my life.

Judy: But Beatrix told that there are swans who swim on the surface of the water space where you live now. She said that it is possible to fly to you using the swans as transport.

Woman-devil: There is a lake not far from our ocean and there are swans. But I did not have such suggestion as to visit water in this lake. I had only such suggestion for you as to visit our part of ocean and see our world. But because you can not to admit this suggestion, I and Beatrix will tell you about our world. It is Pacific ocean and we have to live there near its banks because there are some dishonest people living right there. The nature is contaminated very much. The banks are contaminated too much with different litter and yuck. It is really appallingly and abhorrent! But I see so incentive to work in my wonderful guys extra-decomposers as it must be. I am very glad how they do what they must do.

Judy: May I ask what is the border of?

Woman-devil: The border is a steal high thick lattice with big cells. It is a very high lattice and was built by me with help of many marine animals. I can negotiate with different marine animals. There are no predators in our confined world. It is very peaceful there. We negotiated to separate the space and live separately from predatory animals. The space is enough far-flung and it is spaciously for us including Beatrix who does not like little close space. The lattice is only about 1 meter not enough to the surface of the ocean.

Judy: May I interest what marine animals helped you in building this lattice?

Woman-devil: Merpeople, different extra-decomposers and some marine animals like crabs, tortoises, squids and other. Now anybody who is a predatory animal lives out of our place.

Judy: It is impressive. Does Beatrix leave this place by swimming through a cell of the lattice to walk out of it?

Woman-devil: Yes, she does. It is interesting for her.

Judy: Does she seek any adventures?

Woman-devil: As I understand, she does.

Judy: What is very interesting what are these adventures? Maybe Beatrix longs for some adventures where is a gravity for life of creatures like her?

Beatrix: No, nothing like this! You understand quite wrong, Judy! I just see the underwater world and communicate with different marine inhabitants. I do not seek perilous adventures.

Judy: And what do you talk with them about?

Beatrix: I talk with them about different things like life in the ocean regarding different aspects such as life style of these animals, their reproducing, nurturing their youngs and many things like these. Please, do not worry about me. I beg you.

Judy: I thought you live in a lake, but now I know you live not in a lake, you live in an ocean. It is what induced Helen to worry about you. I remember you said the part of ocean where you live is fenced by a big and thick lattice, but who knows what else? You said you like seeking adventures out of these your living part of ocean. Who knows how buxom this fence is? You want say you can warrant that no predators can disturbance the lattice and reach you?

Woman-devil: I can warrant that I have enough strong magic forces to create enough buxom obstraction of predators.

Judy: Where have you got the building material steal from?

Woman-devil: From a material factory.

Judy: And how is it related with your magic forces?

Woman-devil: There is very much what I can tell you. Lets sit on my horse and go to the bank of the ocean and I will give you much information.

Author's words: Woman-devil, Judy and Beatrix sat on the horse's back and moved to the way.

Judy: Lady Devil, have you ever had wigs and flew through them?

Woman-devil: Yes, I had. I can do with myself what I have done with Beatrix but not reducing myself. If I want fly like a butterfly I roll myself in a cocoon and sleep in it. The cocoon hangs on a branch of a very big and strong wood. When I wake up I unwrap the cocoon and have big wigs and horns like a butterfly. I can fly moving my wigs so much as I want. Also I can discard them

Judy: Cool! And they drown in the ocean and lay on its bottom?

Woman-devil: No, they just dissapear.

Judy: What are we going to the ocean for?

Woman-devil: Do not you want go there?

Judy: I do not confront this idea, but I am interested why we are going there. I said that I can not imbue into the ocean.

Woman-devil: I thought you wanted be close to the ocean, the present refuge of mine and Beatrix.

Beatrix: We had such thought that if you can not come to be in our living place then it implies that you would like to come to be near it.

Judy: Ok. Lets do so.

Woman-devil: I will tell you about me and our life on the way. But I must warn you that you, may be will understand not everything clearly. But do not be distressed if it is so. Now I am answering your last question. You asked how my magic forces are related with strength of the fencing. So I am explaining you, but at first I must say that it may be very puzzling for you. You as a human may not understand much. I hope you will be satisfied by the information which you will get from me. Well, what is related with my forces and this lattce - both are related in reality. Forces like mine let make buildings very buxom. They can influence phisical laws and as a result my buildings under my own intention. I am an embodiment from the hereafter. So I can do very much. There is no disparity from my view-point. You were right when you talked about my omnipotence, because I am not a simple human. I am a devil in human female imagery from the hereafter. I have a very grander mission in this world and it is for favor for your universe with life planet.

Beatrix: Judy knows that it is for favor for this world. I remember I, Judy and her friend talked about it. I remember I talked about it with Judy's friend in whose aquarium I lived. I think all her  friends know about it now

Woman-devil: What else do you want hear about?

Judy: My friend Helen whose pet Beatrix was for some time told about one abstract catastrophy alluding to Beatrix's words. What catastrophe is this?

Woman-devil: Do not worry. It is completely not your problem. Only I and, of course, my creatures which are called, as you see, extra-decomposers are responsible for this.

Judy: But what was this?

Woman-devil: People who live near the ocean in which I and Beatrix live now, do not have clear conscience and do not strive to endorse cleaness. So nature in the ocean and on its banks is contaminated very seriously. So my extra-decomposers work for refinement it.

Judy: May I ask why you have been living during whole your life in the ocean, not out of it somewhere on land?

Woman-devil: I have already known that people do not like me very much.

Author's words: The horse is hastening. Judy feels shiver.

Judy: What are we doing?

Woman-devil: We are hasting, as you see. Now we are going to fly more quickly. I have explained what for. What bothers you, Judy?

Judy: Oh, no, Woman-devil, stop it, please! I can't hold! I am going to fall!

Author's words: Woman-devil is stopping the horse. Judy is breathing heavily

Beatrix: So we will have to reach for a very long time. The distance from here to the ocean is very enormous. It is measured in hundreds of kilometers.

Judy: What ocean is it?

Woman-devil: Pacific. The way will be very long if we move with so low speed.

Judy: How much time it takes for you and Beatrix on this horse when you go such distance as from the place of our meeting to the ocean?

Woman-devil: It is the first time when I go such distance. I do not know how much time the trip will take. But I am sure it will be not like a few minutes. It will takes hours.

Judy: But I am afraid so big speed. So, I think, we have to part right now if it is the one way to go to the ocean.

Woman-devil: There are 2 ways, but at the moment there is only one way - on my horse. He begins have wigs like bird wigs after distillation. It can raise and fly with them.

Judy: What is the second way?

Woman-devil: Sometimes I have wigs, too, as I told. I have wigs as if I was a gigantic butterfly. But I make my wigs only after my dreaming through the cocoon like a caterpillar. Current minutes are not my minutes for dream. So now I can not have wigs and bring you and Beatrix to the ocean on my back.

Judy: Then I think it is time to part.

Author's words: At this moment Judy got a thought regarding her riot about Christian. Judy is bothered by his fate in previous life. Maybe Woman-devil is related with Christian's storie in his previous life?

Woman-devil: Yes, Of course, you may go.

Judy: I want ask you another one question.

Woman-devil: I listen you.

Judy: Do you know about my acquaintance Christian? Beatrix wanted them to go to your world and talk with you, but he refused?

Woman-devil: I heard about one human whom Beatrix wanted invite to our meeting in the ocean. But Beatrix did not say his name.

Judy: Probably she meant Christian. He told us his harsh storie and I thought maybe it is related with you.

Woman-devil: What storie?

Judy: At first I have to ask you have you been living in our world for a very long time?

Woman-devil: Yes, I have according to human measurements. I have been living here for many human years. What sharp storie about your acquaintance was this?

Judy: He was a scientist and one night in his life when he carried out his scientific deal in a forest he collided with a mystery creature. It played out very negative role in his life. He could not to continue to engage science so long as he wanted. Now he lives his next life and claims to continue doing science what he could not continue in his previous life. When he told us about this event in his previous life he described the creature which he saw. So I thought, maybe, it was one of your creatures? Can you remember all your creatures, if they are not too much?

Woman-devil: How Christian described the creature?

Judy: It was similar to a monster. But I can not describe it particularly. Sorry. I remember only such facts that it had red burning in darkness eyes and clutches. Christian was daunted with it. So he has abdicated from his engagement and run away from the forest. After that he had tangible troubles in his life. He was taken for a madman.

Woman-devil: So if it was a monster and it was related with me it means it could be only me in monster imaginary. I am very sorry.

Beatrix: May I paste my word, please?

Judy: Of course, you may.

Beatrix: I want you, Lady Devil, to notice that Judy does not want accuse you with offense. But she sincerely regrets about Christian's fate. So she wants find out the reason for this accident. Also she wants this Christian's trouble not to repeat again.

Woman-devil: I understand. I really can take monsters imaginaries at night when I go to forests and dissipate my extra-decomposers there. I did it. But I do not know how looks Christian and I do not remember how looked the people whom I saw in the forests. So I can not remember my meeting with Christian. But you have to transfer Christian from me the information that he may not to worry in the forests. If I being in a monster imaginary see people in a forest I will take not scary imaginary. And if I see that they are daunted I will calm down them. I will try not to allow them go mad.

Judy: So I was very glad to see you, Lady Devil and you, Beatrix, too. I think it is time to say good bye and part.

Beatrix: We were gald, too. Have good and durable impressions.

Woman-devil: It was a splendid meeting. It was next time when I liked my communication with a human. I see again that there are very good people in the world beside different stinkers.

Author's words: Judy is getting down from the horse

Beatrix: I would like you to go to visit us and see multitude of different marine inhabitants. Also we would talk else.

Judy: Sorry, Beatrix. I think it would be interesting, but I am not sure I will have such possibility.

Beatrix: Then I just wish you good luck and long positive impressions.

Woman-devil: From me, too.

Judy: Thank you.

Author's words: Judy is going in direction to home. Woman-devil and Beatrix are flying off on the horse.
